author: Vincent Kearney
title: GPs in NI to send advice letters to 'at risk' patients
description: Doctors across Northern Ireland have been sent letters to distribute to more than 40,000 patients considered to be at "at risk of severe illness" if they contract coronavirus.
content:
Doctors across Northern Ireland have been sent letters to distribute to more than 40,000 patients considered to be at "at risk of severe illness" if they contract coronavirus.
The letters advise the patients to stay at home and avoid all face to face contact… [+2649 chars]
